it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.tcp

Interface TcpConnectionListener


  • public interface TcpConnectionListener
    Listener of a TCP connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClose(TcpConnection tcp_conn)
      When the connection is closed by the remote entity.
      void onClosed(TcpConnection tcp_conn)
      When the connection has been closed.
      void onConnected(TcpConnection tcp_conn)
      When a new TCP connection is established.
      void onReceivedData(TcpConnection tcp_conn, byte[] buf, int off, int len)
      When a new data is received.
      void onReset(TcpConnection tcp_conn)
      When the connection is reset by the remote entity.
